data.title: Extra Virgin Olive Oil
data.text:
Item # 80510

Alessi 17 fl. oz Extra Virgin Olive Oil

$13.74

Single Unit - 17 fl. oz

Quantity

Cold-pressed extra virgin olive oil reflects the union of the earth's finest elements: fertile soil, sunny climate and the freshly-squeezed fruit of centuries-old olive trees. This earthy, robust oil captures the true essence of olives. Alessi Extra Virgin Olive Oil is made exclusively from olives grown, harvested and pressed in Italy. This premium olive oil from the first cold pressing offers a fruity taste and perfect balance of flavor for all your culinary uses. The special dark glass protects the delicate nature of this product. Drizzle over hot soups, vegetables or salads. Enjoy unaltered taste by dipping pieces of crusty bread into a bowl of salted and peppered oil. Taste the difference.
